thread.title: Andrea A
thread.title_full: Zopa Ltd reviewed by Andrea A

author: Andrea A
title: Andrea A
text: I was slightly sceptical at first not knowing anything about zopa but found it via experia. The loan application was simple and the whole process quick & easy. I was very impressed. Better still it is all done on-line. I also particularly like that by logging into my account I can see, at any stage, payment details and settlement figure. Really impressed by Zopa.
